disease_info: Fever is usually caused by infections like viral flu or malaria.
Cough may be due to cold, flu, asthma, or lung infections.
Common cold is a viral infection affecting the nose and throat.
Headache may be caused by stress, migraine, or dehydration.
Vomiting may be caused by food poisoning, stomach infection, or migraine.
Flu (influenza) is a viral infection causing fever, cough, body pain.
medicine: Rest, hydration, paracetamol, antiviral (Oseltamivir) if severe.

disease_info: Heart attack is caused by blocked blood flow to the heart.
Migraine is a severe headache often with nausea and sensitivity to light.
Diabetes is a condition where blood sugar levels are too high.
High blood pressure increases the risk of heart disease.
Asthma causes difficulty in breathing due to airway narrowing.
Malaria is a mosquito-borne disease causing fever and chills.
Typhoid is a bacterial infection causing high fever and weakness.
Dengue is a mosquito-borne viral fever with low platelets.
medicine: Paracetamol, hydration, avoid NSAIDs like Aspirin.

disease_info: Chickenpox causes itchy blisters and fever.
TB is a bacterial infection that mainly affects lungs.
Pneumonia is a lung infection with fever, cough, chest pain.
Jaundice is caused by liver problems leading to yellow eyes/skin.
medicine: Rest, hydration, avoid alcohol, treat underlying cause.

disease_info: Hepatitis is liver inflammation caused by viruses A, B, or C.
Anemia occurs when body lacks healthy red blood cells.
medicine: Iron supplements, folic acid, vitamin B12.

disease_info: Arthritis causes joint pain and stiffness.
COVID-19 is a viral infection causing fever, cough, breathing issues.
medicine: Rest, hydration, paracetamol, antivirals if severe.

disease_info: HIV weakens the immune system, increasing infection risk.
AIDS is the advanced stage of HIV infection.
Syphilis is a bacterial STD causing sores and rash.
Gonorrhea affects genitals, rectum, and throat.
Chlamydia is a bacterial infection causing genital pain.
Herpes causes painful blisters around genitals/mouth.
HPV is a viral infection that can cause genital warts and cancer.
medicine: No cure, HPV vaccine prevents it.

disease_info: Trichomoniasis is caused by a parasite, leading to discharge and itching.
Stomach ulcer is caused by excess acid or H. pylori infection.
Stroke occurs when blood supply to brain is blocked.
Kidney disease affects the bodyâ€™s ability to filter waste.
medicine: Dialysis in severe cases, ACE inhibitors.

disease_info: Epilepsy is a neurological disorder causing seizures.
Anxiety causes excessive fear and nervousness.
Depression is a mood disorder with sadness and low energy.
Insomnia is difficulty falling or staying asleep.
Allergies are immune reactions to pollen, food, or dust.
Eczema causes itchy, inflamed skin patches.
Psoriasis causes scaly skin patches due to immune reaction.
Conjunctivitis is an eye infection causing redness and discharge.
Ear infection causes ear pain, swelling, and fever.
Toothache may be due to cavity, infection, or gum disease.
Gastritis is inflammation of stomach lining.
Obesity increases risk of diabetes and heart disease.
medicine: Lifestyle changes, Orlistat in severe cases.

disease_info: Hypothyroidism means underactive thyroid gland.
Overactive thyroid causes weight loss, anxiety, sweating.
